description.ko: 미개척된 심해저의 숨겨진 신비를 포착하는 동시에 극한의 압력을 견디도록 설계된 최첨단 심해 탐사 유닛입니다.
description.en: A cutting-edge deep-sea exploration unit designed to withstand extreme pressure while capturing the hidden mysteries of the uncharted ocean floor.

prompt: A futuristic high-tech research submersible named AQUA-5 navigating the midnight zone of the deep ocean, surrounded by glowing bioluminescent jellyfish and strange crystalline structures, hydrothermal vents emitting smoke in the background, cinematic lighting, ultra-detailed, 8k resolution, dark teal and obsidian color palette.
